name: Hotel Parking Driving Master
description:
A city of tall skyscrapers needs a lot of transportation and parking assistance from the professionals. Hotel car parking master of driving is the ultimate realistic and fun game. City parking lot valet driver for a hotel is amazing job.
A total dynamite parking of cars in the back alley of the giant hotel building. To make the game more interesting and challenging we have added the maximum obstacles & hurdles.
Hotel Car Parking Master of Driving have the simulation gameplay with stunning graphics. This SUV car parking party will rock all other parties. Actually park while learning to excel at this game. Become the master of parking with the practice. Test various driving methods with variable controls and the camera view angles. Parking sensors make it easy to park.
Use acceleration and game pedals to show various parking skills. Turn on the driver view for more precise driving. Forward and backward driving in the close brackets drives you crazy. Smooth and fastest loading gameplay. Finish mission before the time ends. Biggest mobile driving simulation category is car parking, we twisted the concept a little bit by adding the hotel valet parking boy into the scene.
Hotel car Parking Master of Driving features:
• New and exciting cars with custom colors to drive
• Amazing sound effects for cars and the obstacles getting trashed by the cars.
• Take the steering wheel for driving or use the turn direction buttons
